title: Ground News - Khawaja Nafay: 'My job was to just work hard, and now, this one innings has changed everything'
text: Khawaja Nafay: 'My job was to just work hard, and now, this one innings has changed everything' Khawaja Nafay smashed an unbeaten 60 off 31 against Lahore Qalandars. The 22-year-old went viral in Summary by Ground News Bangladesh after the match. He has been in the Pakistan Super League since the start of the season. He was picked up by Quetta Gladiators after impressing in the BPL. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
